directions: Heat oil in skillet.  Add chops and cook until browned.
Add soup, milk and 1/2 package salad dressing mix.  Heat to a boil.  Cover and cook over low heat 10 minutes or until done.  Sprinkle with paprika.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
1 (1 ounce) package ranch salad dressing mix
title: Creamy Ranch Pork Chops and Rice
